title: NO power outages after 6:30 PM
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) stated that there will be NO power cuts after 6.30 PM today (25) for the convenience of students appearing for the G.C.E Ordinary Level Examination.
However, the CEB said that a maximum of 3 hours of power cuts are planned between 5.00 AM and 6.30 PM.
